mapper.select: SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, TITLE, COMMUNITY_YN, READ_CNT, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT FROM COMMUNITY ORDER BY COMMUNITY_YN, REG_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( COMMUNITY_SEQ, TITLE, COMMUNITY_YN, CONTENS, USER_ID, READ_CNT REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.COMMUNITY_SEQ),0)+1 FROM COMMUNITY A), #{title}, #{communityYn}, #{contents}, #{userId}, 0, #{userId}, SYSDATE(), #{userId}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, TITLE, COMMUNITY_YN, READ_CNT, USER_ID, CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET TITLE = #{title}, COMMUNITY_YN = #{communityYn}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, CHG_ID = #{userId}, CHG_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
